title: For Trade: Red Hindu Mcgraw PSA 1.5
author: Mjpadilla84

posts.post_title: For Trade: Red Hindu Mcgraw PSA 1.5
posts.post_content: I have a Red Hindu Mcgraw Glove at Hip PSA 1.5 for trade.  I’m looking for drum or uzit HOF backs in any grade. Also would be interested in PSA grade 6 plus HOF’s. If anyone is interested PM or text me at 8153436260.
